subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Samantha Stosur beat Venus Williams, 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, ending the chance at an all-Williams-sister semifinal at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.
snippet: Samantha Stosur beat Venus Williams, 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, ending the chance at an all-Williams-sister semifinal at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.
